Title: Silverlight offline database
Description:
This project is about creating an offline database storage in Silverlight to persist data when user is offline. It consists of a sample of how to build a simple local database in Silverlight using Isolated Storage and LINQ.

Please share  your thoughts regarding additional features you would like to see and suggestions for improving this.
